mapper.select: SELECT SR_NO AS srNo, PRGRS_ID AS prgrsId, to_char(BGNG_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bgngYmd, to_char(END_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endYmd, PRGRS_RT AS prgrsRt FROM PROGRESS P WHERE P.SR_NO = #{srNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PROGRESS SET BGNG_YMD = #{bgngYmd}, END_YMD = #{endYmd}, PRGRS_RT = #{prgrsRt} WHERE PRGRS_ID = #{prgrsId}
